attributes.action: Demand that the UN investigate atrocities and prosecute warcrimes carried out against civilians in Gaza 08/09 such as the deliberate horrific use of white phosphorus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is nothing more horrific than the deliberate use of weapons such as WHITE PHOSPHORUS on trapped civilians. This weapon burns through into bone and cannot be extinguished. It falls into the same category as weapons used by Saddam Hussein. This weapon was used by a modern/mechanised fully equipped army against civilians trapped-denied any exit. Not once in error but repeatedly. Investigation should be carried out into targeting of UN buildings and supplies & every effort afforded to ensure the prosecution of those commanders in breach of the Geneva convention.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
